nodes.bodyText:
Thanks @regisd for fixing this up. I had some questions:
We have some other http requests that are made in this class.

Do we need stats_tag's for each of those as well?
If yes, can we reuse the same stats tag? Or do we unique one's? And should we reserve them just like you did in cl/348055557

Like GenerateToken & Delete.

Ah good point! Indeed, all http connections need to be tagged.
The initial cl/348055557 reserves a whole range in Firebase common. For more fine-grained tagging, we can use "Secondary tags".
Added the secondary tags in cl/351113253. Since the primary tag is reserved for firebase-installations, I don't think there is a requirement in the order of submission of the CL and the PR.
